TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. *eats it and drops the peel where you're walking*

I wish for a huge cave of glowing blue mushrooms (Like Blackreach, but with less Falmer)

Granted. Unfortunately, it's filled to the brim with hostile Dwemerbots instead.

I wish the Finns weren't so upset with that bad joke of mine a bit back.

Granted, they're not upset anymore now that they've killed you

I wish that they will finish the next elder scrolls sequel soon.

Granted, but you'll be too busy by the time of its release, therefore you won't be able to play it at all.

I wish that the purists will keep their purism to themselves.

Granted, but now everyone is a purist.

I wish I could add MOAR BOOSTERS with out there being MOAR INSTABILITY.

Edited May 9, 2013 by Jarod645

Granted but now Jeb has built a rocket with a thousand boosters for each stage. Have fun

I wish that I could implant my brain into a computer so I am always on these forums or playing KSP.

Granted. But you can't take it back so you a traped in the interwebs.

I wish that I could punch Adolf Hitler in the face.

Granted but you are killed a second later. Also, you have made Hitler more aggressive in his actions so he wins World War Two (or as its now know the Great Liberation of the Aryan race) and the entire world is now under the control of his son, Adolf Junior.

I wish that I don't have to sleep.

Granted. You now have Fatal Familial Insomnia.

I wish for power.

Granted. You become Hitler and I punch you.

I wish to become the new Tsar of Russia.

Granted. You are ÃÂ¦ÃÂ°Ã‘â‚¬Ã‘Å’ ÃÂÃÂ¸ÃÂºÃÂ¾ÃÂ»ÃÂ°ÃÂ¹ Ãâ€™Ã‘â€šÃÂ¾Ã‘â‚¬ÃÂ¾ÃÂ¹ (Killed in the Russian Revolution.)

I wish I could land on the Mun from a 5 km orbit.

Granted, you have landed on the Mun in a thousand pieces.

I wish that humans would realise that we don't have to kill each other all the time

Granted. We start killing all the monkeys in the world instead.

I wish BobCat was my personal friend.

Granted, he is now you pet bobcat

I wish that we would develop our morals at the same rate as our technology.

Granted but we are back in the Stoneage

I wish I was in the show stargate Atlantis

Granted. That stupid stargate breaks and can never be fixed.

I wish that fox never canceled Firefly.

GRANTED. And no, I'm not going to corrupt that because ^$%( YOU FOX!!!!!!!

I wish that Stargate: Universe never happened

Granted. I hated that show.

I wish that this wish will be corrupted.

GRANTED but you turn into a jelly pie and are eaten a waffle monster

I wish that i was bigger

Granted, but you are a giant NINJA who likes to NINJA people so they have been NINJA'D.

I wish that I actually knew anything at all about popular TV shows

Edited May 9, 2013 by (An Original Name)

Granted. But you only know about reality shows and Glee.

I wish for more episodes of Breaking Bad.

Granted but they are stargate universe in disguise

i wish to be better at art
